title: [St Kilda Esplanade]
brief_description: Early footage of St Kilda, Victoria, showing the entrance to Luna Park with a group of people walking past and chatting outside the Daylight Picture Cinema next door. Ends with a group of people standing on a small jetty on the beach.
description: Early footage of St Kilda, Victoria, showing the entrance to Luna Park with a group of people walking past and chatting outside the Daylight Picture Cinema next door. Ends with a group of people standing on a small jetty on the beach.
